data.title: Great food and service
data.text: Hadn't seen my friend for over a year.  She lives near Tail-Gators and said it was great.  She was right!   The burger was scrumptous but the sides were even more interesting.   Onion petals, sweet potatoe salad, and others.   Will be going back.  Thank you to my friend for introducing this restaurant to me.

data.title: Great place to watch the NFL
data.text: Good bar food, sports atmosphere, fun place to watch the Sunday NFL games with friends. Excellent service

user_location.name: Port Saint Lucie, Florida, United States

data.title: Lunch with a coupon
data.text:
We stopped in with a coupon for a free lunch and I'm glad we did.  The place was empty, but we heard this is a great place and wanted to try it out.
We had sandwiches for lunch and my husband tried a beer.
The place was not crowded and the waitress came over immediately, but it did take a little time for the food to come out of the kitchen.

Would stop in again or maybe try with a group.

data.title: Great Place
data.text: Our corvette club had dinner here tonight, Our waitress was Nicky. She was amazing, there were 7 people at our table. Nicky didn't write any thing down, she also didn't make a single error on the order. The food l came out at the same time was hot and tasted great. The food is reasonable priced, cooked to perfection, and the service was great. what more could you ask for. I know we will be going back very soon

data.title: Good home made food
data.text: Good home made food cheap prices Good drinks cheap  good service good atmosphere but extreamly loud inside restuarent

owner_response.author: tailgat0rs, Owner at Tail-Gators Brews & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We have recently made changes to the interior to help with noise reduction. Hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice variety of food
data.text: They have everything from steaks, burgers, wings, etc. Service was pretty good. Didn't think much of their ribs. Good side items. Plan to go back to try some more items. It's located in a strip mall off a busy road but when inside can't tell. It was busy during a work week which says something good about the place.

owner_response.author: tailgat0rs, Owner at Tail-Gators Brews & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for business. we look forward to seeing you again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average food,  very slow service
data.text: We had a group of 5 including 2 children.  The staff was nice but food took forever. Very busy place.  Wanted to watch the Olympics and they did have many screens so that worked out well.since traveling through the area worked out fine

data.title: SURPRISE!  SURPRISE!
data.text: This was our first visit to Tail-Gators but for sure won't be our last!  We both had the filet.  it was cooked to perfection and was accompanied by a twice baked potato and a choice of one side.  We choose onion petals - lol - not healthy but they sure were good.   The steaks were a decent size and we even had enough meat and potato to take home for another meal.  Now, you have to realize, this is a $14.99 filet we're talking about.  It's not what you'd get for $35 - - but we were very surprised.  It wasn't the most tender I've ever had but it wasn't tough and the flavor was delicious - - I was 100% pleased and surprised - - and will positively go back for more of the same!!!  Our friends had a French dip and a hamburger.  They said both were great with good flavor and also intend to return.  The portions all seem to be very generous.  Our server was very attentive and friendly.

owner_response.author: tailgat0rs, Owner at Tail-Gators Brews & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much!! So glad that you found us and will return :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food aand drink in a sports atmosphere
data.text: We have eaten here on a few occasions and have enjoyed each time we have. The restaurant has an open feel, TV's playing sports, and a friendly staff. We have tried several items off of the menu and liked every one. beer selections are numerous, and portions are quite large. From seafood to burgers, Italian to mignon, great value for the prices, which are not high.

data.title: All 4 of us will return
data.text: My husband and I and our neighbors tried this restaurant because we had BOGO coupons.  We will return and pay full price. Restaurant is huge, clean, and full of TV's to make the sports fans happy. Our server, Buzz, clearly takes great pride in his work as he was knowledgeable and enthusiastic and did not miss a step. My friend and I had the chicken parm with pasta.   It came with a nice salad and garlic bread and was enough that I have a second helping for, I think, $11.99. My husband had chicken tenders with fries and coleslaw and our other friend had the wings. For starters, we had the fried mozzarella. This was clearly not the frozen sticks we expected. Huge hunks of cheese that were clearly hand battered. We all agreed we would come back and order these meals again. Good service, reasonable prices, good food. Buzz's personality was a treat. We recommend this restaurant.

owner_response.author: Dannisue, Owner at Tail-Gators Brews & Grill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much. We look forward to seeing you again in the future :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great onion soup
data.text:
Start with cold beer and appetizer of spinach and artichoke dip :-( too dry.. French Onion soup .. Excellent.. Then shrimp scampi  .. 
Wife... Garlic Shrimp and Parmesan garlic fries ... Lots of fresh garlic..
Server : Sarah T .. Friendly and very good ...

data.title: Great Value but room for improvement
data.text: Not a fancy place but great prices.  Draft for $1.99, filet mignon for $15. Friendly service. Matt had been on the job for only a week but had the right attitude. Works hard, customer is right and he can take a joke, even bad ones.  My filet was very good. Two things: 1) one of the plates arrived with only the chicken ...fries to come!!!! When they came there were only about half there.  2) too much batter on the shrimps.

data.title: Really good food
data.text:
We stopped at this restaurant before 4pm after a day at the ballpark.  On walking in I thought - this is a great bar area.  There were 18 tvs showing a variety of sports and many more waiting for a larger crowd, many wooden table and chairs, an attractive long bar and 2 bar areas in the back.  This looked like a great place for a beer and fun conversation but what about food.
We we warmly greeted by the friendly staff.  From the dinner menu I ordered the grilled shrimp that came with rice pilof and a side.  I chose mac & cheese.    I know vegetables would be more healthy but I like m&c.  Great selection.  The food was delicious - the 9 shrimp done just right, the rice tasty and the good sized portion of mac & cheese up there with the best.  All this for $11.
Service friendly & professional, ambiance fun, food excellent.  We will be back

data.title: Sides are always home made
data.text: Hamburgers are always done correctly. Juicy and full of flavor. French fries, where ,you can actually taste the potato. Mac and cheese are home made, not out of a box. Sandwich  menu is quite varied.  Service is always friendly and prompt.

data.title: Fall Off the Bone Ribs
data.text: For $14.99 you can enjoy a full rack of perfectly cooked, tender and meaty ribs, cole slaw and one other side. We chose their delicious homemade mac and cheese  and a starter of crispy wings. Our  first rate server, Danielle, was very attentive and friendly which added to the whole experience. The only negative (for me) was a steady twang of country music. Mixing up the genres would be an improvement.

data.title: Greasy Bar Food
data.text: We decided to give them a try. First the good, our waitress was super. The bad, the food was over-priced and nothing spectacular. Started with French onion soup, which was salty and not even warm. Mozzarella sticks were huge, but greasy. My husband had wings, they were ok. I had the grilled chicken sandwich, again  ok but nothing special. Fries were frozen. We won't be back.

data.title: Great wings..great service
data.text: I went there with 5 buddies after work...we were reluctant when we walked in...full bar and one person working..the host..who's name i failed to recall, but I will refer to him as Johnny on the Spot...he must have exceptional organization skills. We have 2 pitchers of beer, fries,these incredible chicken and cheese topped fries..50 wings with 5 different flavors..oh and these monstrous mozzarella sticks..definitely made in house "Johnny" never missed a beat..kept the drinks full and checked up on everything we needed...the wings were fried perfect..sauces were on point and the beer was cold (go with yuengling over Miller lite)..over all great spot to watch the games and get great fresh food without breaking the bank

data.title: Food better than expected
data.text:
My wife and I drove up to this restaurant because we had a 'buy one get one' free coupon and wanted to check this place out. We are glad we did!

From the outside this looks like a typical sports bar and grill, however the food is definitely way better than  the average for this type of place.

I had the Buffalo chicken sandwich and really enjoyed it. The chicken was hand battered and fried to perfection and the medium sauce was spicy but not overpowering. There was a generous heaping of blue cheese crumbles that nicely accentuated the sauce and chicken. The sandwich also came with Romaine lettuce and tomato. I asked for no onions which are normally included. For a side, I chose the macaroni and cheese based on the waitress's recommendation and was happy I did. It has to be among the best restaurant Mac and cheese I've ever had. Comes in a cup like a bowl of chowder. It is made with at least two kinds of cheeses and was really good.
My wife ordered a half rack of baby backed ribs, which were slightly overcooked, however they still had a good taste and lots of meat in them. She also had a side salad that would make any vegetarian envious.  Very nice greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, etc. It was a very nice healthy salad that almost seemed out of place in a sports bar. No iceberg lettuce in this dish.
The prices are very reasonable especially considering the quality of the food. The portion sizes also left us no room for dessert. 
Highly recommend and will definitely be back!

data.title: Surprisingly Great Food!
data.text: We came in to try it because we had an enjoyment coupon.  Had the gator bits, they were tender and delicious (the sauce was just ok).  We both had the rib and filet combo.  Everything was cooked and seasoned perfectly.  Our server was Buzz and he was super friendly and helpful! Ill definitely go back!

data.title: Good wings and buffalo chicken sandwich
data.text: Nice place. They only had one person working the place but Frederick tried hard to make everyone happy. You can bring your pet if eat outside, a bit noisey with highway so close but it was ok. They offer specials on drinks. Several other places in this strip mall worth checking out.
